de.coreengine.rendering.model

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.coreengine.rendering.model.Mesh

  • public class Mesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represent a simple model, wich has only one material and consists of only one mesh
    Author:
    Darius Dinger
